price: Basi wakatupa kamba zao na fimbo zao, na wakasema: Kwa nguvu za Firauni hakika sisi hapana shaka ni wenye kushinda.
arabic: فَأَلۡقَوۡاْ حِبَالَهُمۡ وَعِصِيَّهُمۡ وَقَالُواْ بِعِزَّةِ فِرۡعَوۡنَ إِنَّا لَنَحۡنُ ٱلۡغَٰلِبُونَ
footnotes: Wakazitupa kamba zao na fimbo zao, na watu wakazugwa wakaona kama ni nyoka wanakwenda. Wakaapa kwa utukufu wa Firauni na nguvu zake hapana shaka hawa leo watashinda

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: fa-alqaw ḥibālahum waʿiṣiyyahum waqālū biʿizzati fir'ʿawna innā lanaḥnu al-ghālibūna
